title: Feature request: Operate multiple remote desktop functions simultaneously and in parallel !
author: dakangsiji
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Provide a tool to operate multiple remote desktops simultaneously and in parallel

## Context
Hello, although various current remote desktop tools can realize the use of remote desktop services, they only realize the serial method to operate each windows server. No any tools real realizes the function of parallel operation of multiple servers at the same time.
that is a group operation. 
In this scenario, a client needs to do the same thing on multiple remote desktops ...
